     2â†’# **Calculation Rules**
     3â†’
     4â†’  
     5â†’
     6â†’## **1. Input Values**
     7â†’
     8â†’- **T**: Total study time
     9â†’    
    10â†’- **P**: Passive knowledge ratio (0â€“1)
    11â†’    
    12â†’- **A**: Active knowledge ratio (0â€“1)
    13â†’    
    14â†’- **F**: Focused study ratio (0â€“1)
    15â†’    
    16â†’- **B**: Broad study ratio (0â€“1)
    17â†’    
    18â†’
    19â†’  
    20â†’
    21â†’### **Conditions**
    22â†’
    23â†’- P + A = 1
    24â†’    
    25â†’- F + B = 1
    26â†’    
    27â†’
    28â†’---
    29â†’
    30â†’## **2. Passive / Active Time Split**
    31â†’
    32â†’```
    33â†’Passive_Time = T Ã— P
    34â†’Active_Time  = T Ã— A
    35â†’```
    36â†’
    37â†’---
    38â†’
    39â†’## **3. Passive Knowledge Internal Split**
    40â†’
    41â†’```
    42â†’Passive_Focused = (T Ã— P) Ã— F
    43â†’Passive_Broad   = (T Ã— P) Ã— B
    44â†’```
    45â†’
    46â†’---
    47â†’
    48â†’## **4. Active Knowledge Internal Split**
    49â†’
    50â†’```
    51â†’Active_Focused = (T Ã— A) Ã— F
    52â†’Active_Broad   = (T Ã— A) Ã— B
    53â†’```
    54â†’
    55â†’---
    56â†’
    57â†’## **5. Subject Allocation Inside Passive Ã— Focused**
    58â†’
    59â†’- **S**: Subject study time (S â‰¤ T)
    60â†’    
    61â†’
    62â†’```
    63â†’Subject_Passive_Focused = min(S, Passive_Focused)
    64â†’Subject_Passive_Broad   = S âˆ’ Subject_Passive_Focused
    65â†’```
    66â†’
    67â†’---
    68â†’
    69â†’## **6. Subject Internal Ratio Split (e.g. TOEIC LC / RC)**

    73â†’- **R**: Sub-part 2 ratio (e.g. RC)

    75â†’

    83â†’```

    87â†’
    88â†’---
    89â†’
